stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Ensure survey data collection meets GDPR and banking regulations
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Privacy impact assessment and compliance validation workshops

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Validate survey content and consent mechanisms
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Supportive but thorough - requires legal review processes
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Legal review checkpoints and approval workflows integration

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Ensure audit trails and documentation standards
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Audit trail design and documentation standard alignment

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Integrate survey workflow with existing case management
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Process integration and SLA alignment workshops

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Use surveys for customer satisfaction in sensitive collections processes
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.attitude: Cautious - need careful handling of sensitive customer situations
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Sensitive customer handling training and compliance guidelines

stakeholder_engagement_matrix.objectives: Ensure surveys don't create regulatory reporting issues
stakeholder_engagement_matrix.engagement_strategy: Regulatory impact assessment and ongoing monitoring procedures

domain_specific_insights.compliance_risk: Survey system creates new data collection touchpoint requiring comprehensive privacy controls
domain_specific_insights.regulatory_complexity: Must navigate GDPR, banking secrecy laws, and consumer protection regulations
domain_specific_insights.governance_integration: Survey approval workflow must integrate with existing compliance processes

current_challenges: No standardized compliance review process for customer surveys
Manual privacy impact assessments for each survey initiative
Inconsistent data retention policies across survey activities
Lack of audit trail for survey approval and modification processes
Potential regulatory risks from uncontrolled survey deployment
enterprise_enabling_pain_points: Overload of ad-hoc compliance reviews for survey requests
Backlog in case handling due to manual survey approval processes
Seen as bureaucratic blocker when surveys need quick deployment
Difficulty tracking compliance status of active surveys

primary_drivers: Achieve zero regulatory breaches through systematic survey governance
Reduce case resolution time for survey-related compliance reviews
Establish clear audit trail for all survey activities
Enable self-service survey creation while maintaining compliance controls
enterprise_enabling_drivers: Mitigate legal risk through automated compliance checks
Avoid penalties by ensuring systematic privacy protection
Transform from blocker to enabler through streamlined processes
Improve audit pass rate through better documentation

high_level_objectives: 100% of surveys pass compliance review on first submission
Reduce survey approval time from weeks to under 48 hours (SLA)
Zero regulatory breaches related to survey data collection
Achieve 95% audit pass rate for survey-related processes
enterprise_enabling_kpis: Zero breaches maintained through systematic survey governance
SLA <48h for survey compliance case resolution
Improved audit pass rate through automated documentation
Reduced regulatory change impact through built-in compliance controls

scope_in: Automated privacy impact assessment for survey templates
Role-based access control with compliance approval workflows
Audit trail logging for all survey creation and modification activities
Data retention policy enforcement and automated cleanup
GDPR consent mechanism integration in surveys
Compliance review dashboard for ongoing monitoring
Legal entity management integration for survey ownership
Case management integration for survey-related issues
scope_out: Custom legal content management beyond standard disclaimers
Automated legal review of survey content
Advanced audit analytics and risk scoring
assumptions: Existing compliance frameworks are documented and accessible
Legal team has capacity for initial template review processes
GDPR compliance requirements are clearly defined and stable
Case management system has API integration capabilities
Audit requirements are documented and available for implementation
Data classification standards exist for customer survey data
constraints: Must comply with all applicable banking and privacy regulations
Cannot compromise existing audit trail and documentation standards
Integration limited to approved compliance and legal systems
Survey deployment requires legal approval for sensitive customer populations
Data retention must follow existing bank policy without exceptions
Implementation cannot create additional regulatory reporting burdens

enterprise_enabling_considerations.regulatory_constraints: System must accommodate regulatory changes without major rework
enterprise_enabling_considerations.governance_requirements: All survey activities must be fully auditable and documentable
enterprise_enabling_considerations.risk_mitigation: Built-in controls must prevent non-compliant survey deployment

existing_processes.compliance_review: Manual review of survey requests through email and meetings
existing_processes.privacy_assessment: Case-by-case privacy impact evaluation by compliance officers
existing_processes.approval_workflow: Multi-step approval involving legal, compliance, and business teams
existing_processes.audit_documentation: Manual creation of compliance documentation for each survey
existing_processes.monitoring: Periodic manual checks on active surveys for compliance status

current_system_landscape.case_management_system: Existing system for tracking compliance cases and resolutions
current_system_landscape.legal_document_management: Separate system for storing legal templates and approvals
current_system_landscape.compliance_monitoring: Manual tracking in spreadsheets and email threads
current_system_landscape.audit_systems: Separate audit management system with limited survey visibility

manual_activities: Manual privacy impact assessment for each survey request
Manual monitoring of active surveys for compliance status
Case-by-case legal content review and approval
duplications_identified: Repeated privacy assessments for similar survey types
Redundant legal reviews for standard survey elements

compliance_gaps.privacy_protection: No systematic approach to ensuring customer data protection in surveys
compliance_gaps.regulatory_alignment: Surveys may not consistently align with current banking regulations
compliance_gaps.audit_readiness: Limited ability to demonstrate compliance during regulatory examinations

operational_inefficiencies: Compliance officers overloaded with repetitive survey reviews
Extended approval cycles delay important customer feedback collection
Manual processes create bottlenecks and business friction
risk_implications: Potential regulatory breaches from uncontrolled survey deployment
Audit failures due to inadequate documentation and trail
Reputational risk from privacy violations in customer surveys

key_insights_for_designer: Compliance-first design required with automated privacy checks and controls
Integration with existing case management and legal systems essential
Comprehensive audit trail must be built into all survey activities
Approval workflow must balance efficiency with thorough compliance review
domain_specific_requirements: Enterprise Enabling KPI alignment (zero breaches, <48h SLA, audit pass rate)
Automated compliance validation to reduce manual review burden
Integration with existing governance and risk management processes
Built-in privacy protection and regulatory change adaptation capabilities

quality_validation.stakeholder_coverage: Complete - all compliance and governance roles identified
quality_validation.problem_statement_clarity: Clear regulatory and operational pain points defined
quality_validation.as_is_documentation: Comprehensive analysis of current compliance limitations
